README.md:
# __PROJECT_NAME__ - UEFI Application

## Build Requirements

- EDK II (UEFI Development Kit)
- Visual Studio Build Tools (Windows) or GCC (Linux)

## Setup

1. Clone EDK II:
```bash
git clone https://github.com/tianocore/edk2.git
cd edk2
git submodule update --init
```

2. Build Base Tools:
```bash
make -C BaseTools
```

3. Setup environment:
```bash
source edksetup.sh
```

## Build

```bash
build -a X64 -t GCC5 -p __PROJECT_NAME__.dsc
```

## Test

Run in QEMU:
```bash
qemu-system-x86_64 -bios OVMF.fd -hda fat:rw:Build/
```
